title: A cohort-based Partial Internal Model for demographic risk. (arXiv:2307.03090v1 [q-fin.RM])
abstract: We investigate the quantification of demographic risk in a framework consistent with the market-consistent valuation imposed by Solvency II. We provide compact formulas for evaluating inflows and outflows of a portfolio of insurance policies based on a cohort approach. In this context, we maintain the highest level of generality in order to consider both traditional policies and equity-linked policies: therefore, we propose a market-consistent valuation of the liabilities. In the second step we evaluate the Solvency Capital Requirement of the idiosyncratic risk, linked to accidental mortality, and the systematic risk one, also known as trend risk, proposing a formal closed formula for the former and an algorithm for the latter. We show that accidental volatility depends on the intrinsic characteristics of the policies of the cohort (Sums-at-Risk), on the age of the policyholders and on the variability of the sums insured; trend risk depends both on accidental volatility and on the long

translated_title: 面向人口风险的基于队列的部分内部模型研究
translated_abstract: 我们在与 Solvency II 要求的市场一致估值框架中研究了人口风险的定量化问题。我们提供了基于队列方法评估保险组合的流入和流出的简洁公式。在这个背景下，我们保持了最高的一般性，以考虑传统保险和股权关联保险：因此，我们提出了对负债的市场一致估值。在第二步中，我们评估了与意外死亡相关的特异风险（称为意外风险）和系统风险（也称为趋势风险）的审慎资本需求，为前者提供了形式封闭的公式，为后者提供了一个算法。我们展示了意外波动率取决于队列保单的固有特性（风险总额）、保单持有人的年龄和保额的变动性；趋势风险既取决于意外波动率，也取决于长期的趋势。
tldr: 本研究中，我们提出了一个基于队列的内部模型来评估人口风险，并且提供了一套紧凑的公式来评估保险组合的流入和流出。我们还提出了对意外风险和趋势风险的审慎资本需求的计算方法。
